akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general With funds appropriated to carry out this section, the Secretary shall make grants to community-based organizations to provide technical assistance to employers and labor unions selected under subsection (b). Such technical assistance may include—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Selection of employer and labor unions

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Selection of employer and labor unions The Secretary shall select a total of 50 employers or labor unions to receive technical assistance provided with grants made under subsection (a).
